content: a chevron crochet stitch in the back loop only creates the look of this zigzag bag the main body of my bag measures 28 x 36 cm 11 x 14 inches the written pattern and tutorial shows you how to crochet the bag plus i show you how to sew and attach a fabric lining with magnetic clasp throughout the pattern i use both us an uk terms you will need * 3mm hook or a hook that creates a tight gauge * cotton dk in lots of colours approx 200 grams i used paintbox but other dk cotton would be excellent as well * fabric lining and interfacing plus all the sewing gubbins that goes with this * magnetic clasp if you fancy attaching one * bag handles i got mine from amazon etsy always has good ones as well or upcycle some from an existing bag that s no longer used * a needle that is pointy with a largish eye for sewing the bag handles
